title: [Watchtower, Main Floor]
description: The thick stucco walls of the watchtower keep the room cool.  Moonlight filters in through a number of cross-shaped arrow loops.  A commemorative shield is hung on the wall beside a rack of oak-hafted spears.  A wooden stairway leading up follows the curve of the wall.
